item.description:
Join us at the newly opened Papa Razzi Restaurant in Framingham (on Route 9). Known for it's delicious Italian food and great atmosphere, this is definitely worth a visit. Relax, enjoy a great dinner and hang out with other fun and friendly people. Each person pays for their own food/drink. Joint event with the Social Fun Meet Up group.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine, 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo). I will be carrying a large red purse.
item.name: Dinner, Drinks, Fun Times at the new Papa Razzi Restaurant, Framingham
